text: My sister and I are beginners to tennis and taking pair lessons with Coach Eddie! He explains fundamental techniques to us well and is meticulous in correcting our strokes. Since taking up lessons, we have noticed improvements in our playing! Highly recommended Coach Eddie!

My daughter and I signed up for beginner tennis lessons with Coach Eddie and Coach Kelvin in April 24. Both of us enjoyed our lessons very much. Both coaches were patient in teaching us the right techniques and they made the lessons fun for us! We look forward to every tennis lesson! We can see ourselves making good progress after every lesson.

Picking up tennis as a beginner, Iâ€™m happy to have found Coach Eddie, whose made tennis lessons something I look forward to every week. He is patient, corrects our technique, advise how we can improve each stroke and in the most cheerful way. Highly recommended!

I've trained tennis with coach Eddie for 8 months. He is a great guy, always smiling, very patient and experient, corrects our mistakes in a smooth way. He is also very organized with the schedule of lessons, telling well in advance the times and places for the upcoming weeks. I've improved a lot during this period and would definitely recommend Epic Tennis to everyone.

Coach Eddie is exceptional at motivating and connecting with young players. He creates a positive learning environment that promotes growth and enthusiasm for the sport. Our children have shown significant improvement and a genuine love for tennis under his guidance. I highly recommend Epic Tennis Academy for any aspiring young tennis player in Singapore.
